StringTools

type
class
available in
neko, flash9, php, flash8, flash7, flash6
The StringTools class contains some extra functionalities for String manipulation. It's stored in a different class in order to prevent the standard String of being bloated and thus increasing the size of each application using it.

Static Methods

private _urlDecode(Unknown) : String

platforms:
neko

private _urlEncode(Unknown) : String

platforms:
neko

public endsWith(s : String, end : String) : Bool

Tells if the string s ends with the string end.

public hex(n : Int, ?digits : Int) : String

Encode a number into a hexadecimal representation, with an optional number of zeros for left padding.

public htmlEscape(s : String) : String

Escape HTML special characters of the string.

public htmlUnescape(s : String) : String

Unescape HTML special characters of the string.

public isSpace(s : String, pos : Int) : Bool

Tells if the character in the string s at position pos is a space.

public lpad(s : String, c : String, l : Int) : String

Pad the string s by appending c at its left until it reach l characters.

public ltrim(s : String) : String

Removes spaces at the left of the String s.

public replace(s : String, sub : String, by : String) : String

Replace all occurences of the string sub in the string s by the string by.

public rpad(s : String, c : String, l : Int) : String

Pad the string s by appending c at its right until it reach l characters.

public rtrim(s : String) : String

Removes spaces at the right of the String s.

public startsWith(s : String, start : String) : Bool

Tells if the string s starts with the string start.

public trim(s : String) : String

Removes spaces at the beginning and the end of the String s.

public urlDecode(s : String) : String

Decode an URL using the standard format.

public urlEncode(s : String) : String

Encode an URL by using the standard format.
